com

Class MovingAverageImpl<E extends java.lang.Number>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.MovingAverageImpl<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMovingAverage<E>

    public class MovingAverageImpl<E extends java.lang.Number>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMovingAverage<E>
    Implementation of interface IMovingAverage that can store elements which are subtype of Number. Stores and provides average of last N elements added where N is the limit of data structure. When (N+1)th element is added. It removes the first element added in the data structure. Hence, it always contains N or less than N number of elements.

    Provides the average of elements stored in structure.

    Author:
    urvi

        public MovingAverageImpl(int limit)
        Constructs an empty elementList with specified limit. Throws IllegalArgumentException if limit specified is 0 or negative.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.Number num)
        Adds the specified element to this data structure at the end. when new size of the data structure is more than limit, first element is removed from it. It also calculates the running sum of elements added in the data structure.
        Specified by:
        add in interface IMovingAverage<E extends java.lang.Number>
        Parameters:
        num - the element

      • iterator

        public java.util.Iterator<java.lang.Number> iterator()

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        an iterator over the elements in this data structure in FIFO order

      • getAverage

        public double getAverage()
        Returns the average of elements present in data structure. Since total number of elements stored in the data structure is less than or equal to limit. At any point, calculating average on all elements will give average of elements less than or equal to specified limit/ If elementList is empty, it returns 0.
        Specified by:
        getAverage in interface IMovingAverage<E extends java.lang.Number>
        Returns:
        average of elements present in data structure

        Returns the number of elements in this data structure.
